description: A role play fantasy where Dakota Skye plays a naive model that visits a creepy photographer for some simple head shots. But when the pretty, inexperienced model arrives, she is soon surprised to be stripped naked, tied up and fucked in the ass with big, weird objects. Dakota quickly discovers she loves the new sensations and squirms in orgasmic delight as the creepy photographer gives her the Special Treatment.
title: The Naive Model and the Creepy Photographer
